page.title: 02Brisley Shop Closes
page.content: The{shop}sold frozen foods,groceries, cereals and cleaning things. They also sold sweets to many children.It was also a{Post Office.} The people who owned the shop had other jobs as well. The shop was closed, and auctioned on the 29 March 85 but was not sold. When the shop was closed down many people were sorry to see it close,but people needed a post office.There were rumours that a new post office was to be opened but this has not happened yet, although work has started on converting another building to be a Post Office. The space where the Post Office will be is small. Cars won't be able to park anywhere near because there is no space.
